newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Energy, Crested Corp to buy mining venture.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Energy, Crested Corp to buy mining venture.

text.p: U.S. Energy Corp and Crested Corp said they bought an option to buy Kennecott Energy and Coal Co.'s 50 percent interest in the Green Mountain Mining Venture within the next 18 months, which would make them 100 percent owners of the venture.
Under the agreement, the companies would pay either $15 million in cash or $30 million in stock for the uranium venture in south-central Wyoming, they said.

The companies would also repay Kennecott $20 million of cash or stock, plus interest. Kennecott has agreed to advance up to $20 million to them during the next 15 months to develop the venture, expected to produce ore by 1997, they said.
